caption:
The art of welcoming guests never goes out of style. 

@intercontinentalgeneva knows this all too well as they bid adieu to their longtime concierge, Nicolas – a proud Les Clefs d'Or® member for 34 years, a mentor to many, and a warm presence who made every guest feel at home. A heartfelt thank you to Nicolas for crafting bespoke experiences, fulfilling extraordinary requests, and offering expert recommendations to inspire incredible stays.
